news.title: Killing of Trump ally lays bare America's bloody and broken politics
news.summary: Charlie Kirk's killing is another episode of gun violence in America and the latest in a line of recent political violence.

news.title: Harry's tea with Charles could be 'small but significant' step to reconciliation
news.summary: The king and his son have met in person for the first time since February 2024 - but the clues a reunion was nearing have been there, writes senior royal correspondent Daniela Relph.

news.title: Postcode lottery for new cancer treatments, doctors warn
news.summary: Experts say bureaucracy is "stifling innovation" and that applying for funding to pay for new treatments can be "cumbersome".

news.title: Don't stress about being stressed - five tips to manage it
news.summary: Stress, in small doses, can be good for us. Here are five simple, science-backed ways to manage it better.

news.title: What we know about death of close Trump ally
news.summary: Details of the attack in Utah are still unclear, but a large manhunt is under way for the shooter.

news.title: Witnesses describe shooting scene
news.summary: Witnesses at the Utah campus event describe what it was like in the moments before and after the single shot rang out.

news.title: Police manhunt intensifies for suspect
news.summary: Police are searching door-to-door in the hunt for the suspect who shot the conservative activist and influential Trump ally at a Utah campus.

news.title: Chris Mason: Jaws drop in Westminster at Mandelson revelations
news.summary: There is a drip, drip of revelations about the UK's ambassador's past links to Jeffrey Epstein - and calls for his resignation.

news.title: The Papers: 'Harry's tea with the King' and 'Mandelson on brink'
news.summary: Prince Harry and King Charles met in London for the first time in 19 months.
